description.ruby-sapphire:
Stops the foe from moving
with rocks and cuts SPEED.
description.emerald:
Stops the foe from moving
with rocks and cuts SPEED.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Boulders are hurled
at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
SPEED if it hits.
description.diamond-pearl:
Boulders are hurled
at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
Speed by preventing
its movement.
description.platinum:
Boulders are hurled
at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
Speed by preventing
its movement.

at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
Speed by preventing
its movement.
description.black-white:
Boulders are hurled at the target. It also
lowers the target’s Speed by preventing
its movement.

Boulders are hurled at the target. It also

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
